name.value: A Path Appears: Transforming Lives, Creating Opportunity -- A Conversation With Nicholas Kristof and Sheryl WuDunn

value: Pulitzer Prize winning journalists Nicholas Kristof and Sheryl WuDunn aren't content to tell us that we should help the downtrodden. Their focus is on why and how. Even small contributions of time and money matter. And technology and social media make it easier than ever for givers to decide which charities and social enterprises make the best use of donations. Kristof, a New York Times columnist, and WuDunn, a banker and former Times business editor, understand the problem from first-hand observation and experience covering those trapped in misery and the people who have made a difference. Join them as they discuss their book, "A Path Appears: Transforming Lives, Creating Opportunity" and describe the opportunities that exist to improve the lives of others. Following the session, Kristof and WuDunn will sign copies of their book for the audience.
